ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are grateful for the assistance and helpful advice on this manuscript from Dr. Hironobu Fukami and Dr. Go Suzuki and Mr. Keichi Nomura and Mr. Mitsuhiro Ueno for their help with coral sampling. We also thank Mr. Akifumi Shimura, Ms. Yumi Yamamoto, Ms. Eriko Nagahiro and Ms. Ritsuko Kubota for their help with the experiments. This study was supported by the Environment Research and Technology Development Fund (4RF-1501 and 4-1304) of the Ministry of the Environment, Japan, Grant-in-aid for young scientists (A) (17H04996) and the Program to Disseminate Tenure Tracking System from the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT), and the Climate Change Adaptation Research Program of National Institute for Environmental Studies. Sampling was conducted under Okinawa Prefectural Government Permits (No. 27-81, 27-29, 26-10, 25-44, 24-36), a Tokyo Prefectural Government Permit (No. 28-11), a Kochi Prefectural Government Permit (No. 530), and Ministry of the Environment permits (No. 1602252 and 1407181). Elsewhere, we submitted notifications to local governments and worked in agreement with local fishing corporations. We are grateful for the two anonymous reviewers who provided significant comments to improve this manuscript.
